text:
The Mallard Inn is a small tavern and taphouse in [[Mistmarsh]]. It is a favorite haunt of the town reeve, [[Joherra]], who often conducts town business in the common room.

The Mallard is owned by Onneth, an older [[half-elf]] man nearing retirement. Onneth is a good-hearted soul, but he is fretful, forgetful, and somewhat incompetent.

!! During [[The Reavers of Harkenwold]] Adventure

Onneth also can't keep a secret. So, leaders in the resistance against the [[Iron Circle]] are careful about what they say around the old innkeep.
title: Mallard Inn
